cast.overview: A curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school is forced to remain on campus during Christmas break to babysit the handful of students with nowhere to go. Eventually, he forms an unlikely bond with one of them — a damaged, brainy troublemaker — and with the school’s head cook, who has just lost a son in Vietnam.
cast.title: The Holdovers

cast.overview: After his older brother passes away, Lee Chandler is forced to return home to care for his 16-year-old nephew. There he is compelled to deal with a tragic past that separated him from his family and the community where he was born and raised.
cast.title: Manchester by the Sea

details.biography: Oscar Wahlberg was born on August 24, 1998 in Boston, Massachusetts, USA. He is an actor, known for Manchester by the Sea (2016), Slender Man (2018) and What Doesn't Kill You (2008). He is the son of actor, Robert Wahlberg and the nephew of actor, Mark Wahlberg.
details.name: Oscar Wahlberg
